props.name: title
props.description: The title of the pricing section.

props.name: description
props.description: A brief description of the pricing section.

props.name: plans
props.description: A list of pricing plans to be displayed.

imports.name: Card
imports.reason: To display each pricing plan in a structured and visually appealing manner.

imports.name: Button
imports.reason: To allow users to select or purchase a pricing plan.

imports.name: Typography
imports.reason: For displaying text elements like title and description with consistent styling.

imports.name: CheckCircleIcon
imports.reason: To indicate features included in each pricing plan.

imports.name: CloseCircleIcon
imports.reason: To indicate features not included in each pricing plan.

states.name: selectedPlan
states.description: Tracks the currently selected pricing plan.
